TopicTitle: Kerbal Space Program is 40% Off in the KSP Store, Steam & GMG!

Articles.Content:
<p><a href="http://bit.ly/1jTNJaa"><span><img alt="image" src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/3062558db4580aeed1170feef20a6c2f/tumblr_inline_nfnuy1uoQ31rr2wit.png"/></span></a></p>

<p><span><strong>Kerbal Space Program</strong> is now available for <strong>40% off</strong> on the <strong><a href="http://bit.ly/1jTNJaa">KSP STORE</a>,</strong> the <a href="http://bit.ly/1mA3Pdm"><strong>STEAM STORE</strong></a> and <a href="http://bit.ly/1xYmpPX"><strong>GREEN MAN GAMING</strong></a>!<br/></span></p>

<p>Here’s what <a href="

"><strong>TotalBiscuit</strong></a> recently said about KSP: <em>"Right now in its current state, it’s absolutely worth the price they’re asking for."</em></p>

<p>So what does that make it during a sale? Even more than worth the price!</p>

Cool...just a pity pretty much everyone on the forums already bought it XD

Seriously though, if you've only thought about buying it, totalbiscuit is right. It's worth it people.
it's so worth it! I bought mine in 14.5
Hell I just bought it again - never really wanted to convert my KSP Store version over to Steam - now I have both =o)
